function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workplace may not implement proper hazard reduction measures","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of diseases among workers","Mitigation":"Proper implementation of engineering and administrative control measures","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, physical barriers, remote working technologies","People":"Workers in the workplace","Owner":"Workplace management"},{"Description":"Lack of alignment with corporate strategies","Impact":"Ineffective workplace modification and response to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Alignment of workplace modification plans with core business plans and CRE strategies","Technologies":"Strategic planning and communication tools","People":"Top management and operational sectors","Owner":"Organizational leadership"},{"Description":"Inadequate office workplace modification practices","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of diseases in office settings","Mitigation":"Proper implementation of engineering controls and administrative controls","Technologies":"Physical barriers, remote working technologies, communication platforms","People":"Office workers","Owner":"Organizational leadership"}]}
